article_title: An Online Solution To Settling Your Medical Bills

article_metadata.description: The next time you open your medical bills or go online to review your explanation of benefits (EOB), and your blood pressure skyrockets looking at the “patient responsibility” column, know that you are not alone! With employers reducing healthcare coverage drastically in the past several years—choosing not to provide healthcare coverage [...]
